lead_paragraph: Riverdale officers were assisting Clayton County police at an apartment complex in Riverdale when an officer was shot twice by a suspect.

headline.print_headline: Georgia: Officer in Suburban Atlanta Is Shot to Death; Suspect Is Wounded
headline.main: Georgia: Riverdale Police Officer Shot to Death; Suspect Is Wounded

snippet: Riverdale officers were assisting Clayton County police at an apartment complex in Riverdale when an officer was shot twice by a suspect.
abstract: Riverdale, Ga, Police Chief Todd Spivey announces officer has died after law enforcement operation in which suspect shot officer twice.
